mapper.sql: A.IV_D_ID AS ivDId, A.LOAD_NO AS loadNo, A.LOAD_SEQ AS loadSeq, A.PM_ID AS pmId, A.PM_CODE AS pmCode, CONCAT( EXTRACTVALUE(B.PM_EXTERNAL_XML, '/CLS_C'), EXTRACTVALUE(B.PM_EXTERNAL_XML, '/MACH_C'), EXTRACTVALUE(B.PM_EXTERNAL_XML, '/BRE_C'), EXTRACTVALUE(B.PM_EXTERNAL_XML, '/FEAT_C'), EXTRACTVALUE(B.PM_EXTERNAL_XML, '/WEI_C'), EXTRACTVALUE(B.PM_EXTERNAL_XML, '/GRAD_C') )AS pdCode, CONCAT( EXTRACTVALUE(B.PM_EXTERNAL_XML, '/SL_C'), EXTRACTVALUE(B.PM_EXTERNAL_XML, '/SL_P_C') )AS skuCode, B.PM_DESC AS pmDesc, B.PM_NAME AS pmName, A.WH_ID AS whId, A.WH_CODE AS whCode, A.OWNER_ID AS ownerId, A.OWNER_CODE AS ownerCode, EXTRACTVALUE(A.BELONE_XML, '/AREA') AS logicArea, EXTRACTVALUE(A.BELONE_XML, '/PLT') AS platform, EXTRACTVALUE(A.BELONE_XML, '/SLT') AS slType, EXTRACTVALUE(A.BELONE_XML, '/SLID') AS slId, A.SUPPLIER_ID AS supplierId, A.SUPPLIER_CODE AS supplierCode, A.COO AS coo, A.INBOUND_ID AS inboundId, A.INBOUND_NO AS inboundNo, A.INBOUND_DETAIL_ID AS inboundDetailId, A.INBOUND_TYPE AS inboundType, A.PO_ID AS poId, A.PO_NO AS poNo, A.PO_DETAIL_ID AS poDetailId, A.ASN_ID AS asnId, A.ASN_NO AS asnNo, A.ASN_DETAIL_ID AS asnDetailId, A.RI_ID AS riId, A.RI_NO AS riNo, A.RI_DETAIL_ID AS riDetailId, A.PUCHARSE_BATCH AS pucharseBatch, EXTRACTVALUE(IN_EXTERNAL_XML, '/INBAT') AS innerBatch, A.BUY_PRICE AS buyPrice, A.QTY AS qty, A.UOM AS uom, DATE_FORMAT(A.RECV_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS recvDate, DATE_FORMAT(A.RECV_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS recvTime, DATE_FORMAT(A.EXPIRATION_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS expirationDate, A.ALLOCATED_XML AS allocatedXml, A.OUTBOUND_ID AS outboundId, A.OUTBOUND_NO AS outboundNo, A.OUTBOUND_DETAIL_ID AS outboundDetailId, A.OUTBOUND_TYPE AS outboundType, A.CO_ID AS coId, A.CO_NO AS coNo, A.CO_DETAIL_ID AS coDetailId, A.SO_ID AS soId, A.SO_NO AS soNo, A.SO_DETAIL_ID AS soDetailId, A.DI_ID AS diId, A.DI_NO AS diNo, A.DI_DETAIL_ID AS diDetailId, A.OUT_EXTERNAL_XML AS outExternalXml, A.SELL_PRICE AS sellPrice, DATE_FORMAT(A.DISPATCHED_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS dispatchedDate, DATE_FORMAT(A.DISPATCHED_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS dispatchedTime, DATE_FORMAT(A.DELIVER_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS deliverTime, A.IMP AS imp, A.EMP AS emp, A.OMP AS omp, A.IV_FLAG AS ivFlag, A.FLAG_C_TIME AS flagCTime, A.FLAG_C_REASON AS flagCReason, A.IV_STATUS AS ivStatus, A.DEL_FLG AS delFlg, A.CRT_ID AS crtId, DATE_FORMAT(A.CRT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS crtTime, A.UPD_ID AS updId, DATE_FORMAT(A.UPD_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updTime, A.ACT_ID AS actId, DATE_FORMAT(A.ACT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS actTime, A.VER AS ver

where.if: AND CONCAT( EXTRACTVALUE(B.PM_EXTERNAL_XML,'/CLS_C'), EXTRACTVALUE(B.PM_EXTERNAL_XML,'/MACH_C'), EXTRACTVALUE(B.PM_EXTERNAL_XML,'/BRE_C'), EXTRACTVALUE(B.PM_EXTERNAL_XML,'/FEAT_C'), EXTRACTVALUE(B.PM_EXTERNAL_XML,'/WEI_C'), EXTRACTVALUE(B.PM_EXTERNAL_XML,'/GRAD_C') ) = #{pdCode}

mapper.select:
SELECT
from ivm_inventory_detail A inner join ivm_parts_master B on A.pm_id= B.pm_id
ORDER BY PUCHARSE_BATCH,QTY asc

SELECT
from ivm_inventory_detail A inner join ivm_parts_master B on A.pm_id= B.pm_id
ORDER BY PUCHARSE_BATCH,QTY asc LIMIT 1
select count(1) AS dataCount from ivm_inventory_detail A inner join ivm_parts_master B on A.pm_id= B.pm_id
select IFNULL(sum(QTY),0) AS qty from ivm_inventory_detail A inner join ivm_parts_master B on A.pm_id= B.pm_id
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ivm_inventory_detail ( PM_ID, PM_CODE, LOAD_NO, LOAD_SEQ, WH_ID,
WH_CODE,
OWNER_ID,
OWNER_CODE,
BELONE_XML, SUPPLIER_ID, SUPPLIER_CODE,
COO,
INBOUND_ID, INBOUND_NO, INBOUND_DETAIL_ID, INBOUND_TYPE,
PO_ID,
PO_NO,
PO_DETAIL_ID,
ASN_ID,
ASN_NO,
ASN_DETAIL_ID,
RI_ID,
RI_NO,
RI_DETAIL_ID,
PUCHARSE_BATCH,
IN_EXTERNAL_XML,
BUY_PRICE, QTY, UOM,
RECV_DATE,
RECV_TIME,
EXPIRATION_DATE,
IMP, IV_FLAG, IV_STATUS, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, VER ) VALUES ( (SELECT PM_ID FROM IVM_PARTS_MASTER WHERE PM_CODE = #{pmCode}), #{pmCode}, #{loadNo}, #{loadSeq}, #{whId},
#{whCode},
#{ownerId},
#{ownerCode},
#{beloneXml}, #{supplierId}, #{supplierCode},
#{coo},
#{inboundId}, #{inboundNo}, #{inboundDetailId}, #{inboundType},
#{poId},
#{poNo},
#{poDetailId},
#{asnId},
#{asnNo},
#{asnDetailId},
#{riId},
#{riNo},
#{riDetailId},
#{pucharseBatch},
#{inExternalXml},
#{buyPrice}, #{qty}, #{uom},
#{recvDate},
#{recvTime},
#{expirationDate},
#{imp}, #{ivFlag}, #{ivStatus}, 0, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, 1 )
mapper.update: UPDATE IVM_INVENTORY_DETAIL SET IV_STATUS = '52', RECV_DATE = #{recvDate}, RECV_TIME=#{recvTime}, UPD_ID = #{updId}, UPD_TIME = #{updTime}, VER = VER + 1 WHERE INBOUND_ID = #{inboundId}

UPDATE IVM_INVENTORY_DETAIL SET IV_STATUS = '519', RECV_DATE = #{recvDate}, RECV_TIME=#{recvTime}, UPD_ID = #{updId}, UPD_TIME = #{updTime}, VER = VER + 1 WHERE LOAD_NO = #{loadNo} AND LOAD_SEQ = #{loadSeq}

UPDATE IVM_INVENTORY_DETAIL SET IV_STATUS = '52', RECV_DATE = #{recvDate}, RECV_TIME=#{recvTime}, UPD_ID = #{updId}, UPD_TIME = #{updTime}, VER = VER + 1 WHERE LOAD_NO = #{loadNo} AND LOAD_SEQ = #{loadSeq}
UPDATE IVM_INVENTORY_DETAIL SET IV_STATUS = '53', DELIVER_TIME = #{deliverTime}, UPD_ID = #{updId}, UPD_TIME = #{updTime}, VER = VER + 1 WHERE IV_STATUS = '52' AND INBOUND_ID = #{inboundId}

UPDATE IVM_INVENTORY_DETAIL SET IV_STATUS = '53', OUTBOUND_ID = NULL, OUTBOUND_NO = NULL, OUTBOUND_DETAIL_ID = NULL, OUTBOUND_TYPE = NULL, CO_ID = NULL, CO_NO = NULL, CO_DETAIL_ID = NULL, SO_ID = NULL, SO_NO = NULL, SO_DETAIL_ID = NULL, DI_ID = NULL, DI_NO = NULL, DI_DETAIL_ID = NULL, SELL_PRICE = NULL, DISPATCHED_DATE = NULL, DISPATCHED_TIME = NULL, UPD_ID = #{updId}, UPD_TIME = #{updTime}, VER = VER + 1 WHERE OUTBOUND_ID = #{outboundId} AND OUTBOUND_NO = #{outboundNo}

UPDATE IVM_INVENTORY_DETAIL SET IV_STATUS = '55', DISPATCHED_DATE = #{dispatchedDate}, UPD_ID = #{updId}, UPD_TIME = #{updTime}, VER = VER + 1 WHERE OUTBOUND_ID = #{outboundId} AND OUTBOUND_NO = #{outboundNo}

UPDATE IVM_INVENTORY_DETAIL SET IV_STATUS = '56', DELIVER_TIME = #{deliverTime}, DISPATCHED_TIME = #{dispatchedTime}, UPD_ID = #{updId}, UPD_TIME = #{updTime}, VER = VER + 1 WHERE OUTBOUND_ID = #{outboundId} AND OUTBOUND_NO = #{outboundNo}
